ew-extension.name: Audit Trail
ew-extension.author: e.World
ew-extension.description:
Audit Trail Options
Options: Add - audit trail on add (log data) Edit - audit trail on edit (log primary key and modified data only) Delete - audit trail on delete (log data) View - audit trail on view (log primary key of records only) ViewData - log data also (see note 3 below) Search - audit trail on search (log search criteria only)
Notes: 1. This extension does NOT require any additional files or zip file. 2. The settings will be used only if the [Audit Trail] option is enabled in the Table Setup page. To enable Audit Trail for a table, please set up in Table Setup page. See Table Setup in the help file. 3. Enabling 'ViewData' will create a lot of records and may affect performance. Make sure you use them discreetly.
